name: Caves of Qud
description: Caves of Qud is a science fantasy roguelike epic steeped in retrofuturism, deep simulation, and swathes of sentient plants. Come inhabit an exotic world and chisel through layers of thousand-year-old civilizations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: 1GHz or faster. SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card:  DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. Storage: 2 GB available space
